creator: bengt.soderberg@purplescout.se
text:
Created attachment 33547
Testcase

While updating poi from 3.11 to 3.13 some of our tests failed, we're working around it for now but just thought I'd report it in as a bug as it's a change in the API that might be unintended. Attaching necessary code to reproduce problem, works in 3.11 but fails in 3.13

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Changes in r1666736 bug 56295 seem related here.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Should be fixed in time for 3.14 via r1729964, changelog via r1729966
